verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear זֹ֨את <WH2063> O הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> ye this O priests וְהַקְשִׁ֣יבוּ ׀ <WH7181> and hearken בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> ye house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבֵ֤ית <WH1004> O house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king הַאֲזִ֔ינוּ <WH238> and give ye ear כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לָכֶ֖ם הַמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> for judgment כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פַח֙ <WH6341> [is] toward you because ye have been a snare הֱיִיתֶ֣ם <WH1961> have been לְמִצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> on Mizpah וְרֶ֖שֶׁת <WH7568> and a net פְּרוּשָׂ֥ה <WH6566> spread עַל־ <WH5921> on תָּבֽוֹר׃ <WH8396> upon Tabor
וְשַׁחֲטָ֥ה <WH7819> to make slaughter שֵׂטִ֖ים <WH7846> And the revolters הֶעְמִ֑יקוּ <WH6009> are profound וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I מוּסָ֥ר <WH4148> though I [have been] a rebuker לְכֻלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> I know אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not נִכְחַ֣ד <WH3582> is not hid מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at כִּ֤י <WH3588> For עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now הִזְנֵ֣יתָ <WH2181> thou committest whoredom אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> from me for now O Ephraim נִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> is defiled יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [and] Israel

לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יִתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> They will not frame מַ֣עַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4611> their doings לָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> to turn אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> unto their God כִּ֣י <WH3588> For ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> for the spirit זְנוּנִים֙ <WH2183> of whoredoms בְּקִרְבָּ֔ם <WH7130> [is] in the midst וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> of them and they have not known

וְעָנָ֥ה <WH6030> doth testify גְאֽוֹן־ <WH1347> And the pride יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> to his face וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> therefore shall Israel וְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> and Ephraim יִכָּֽשְׁלוּ֙ <WH3782> fall בַּעֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> in their iniquity כָּשַׁ֥ל <WH3782> also shall fall גַּם־ <WH1571> also יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah עִמָּֽם׃ <WH5973> with

בְּצֹאנָ֣ם <WH6629> with their flocks וּבִבְקָרָ֗ם <WH1241> and with their herds יֵֽלְכ֛וּ <WH1980> will go לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יִמְצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> but they shall not find חָלַ֖ץ <WH2502> [him] he hath withdrawn מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> against

בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> against the LORD בָּגָ֔דוּ <WH898> They have dealt treacherously כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָנִ֥ים <WH1121> children זָרִ֖ים <WH2114> strange יָלָ֑דוּ <WH3205> for they have begotten עַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> Now יֹאכְלֵ֥ם <WH398> devour חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> now shall a month אֶת־ <WH854> with חֶלְקֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2506> them with their portions ס

תִּקְע֤וּ <WH8628> Blow שׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> ye the cornet בַּגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1390> in Gibeah חֲצֹצְרָ֖ה <WH2689> [and] the trumpet בָּרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> in Ramah הָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> cry aloud בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <WH1007> [at] Bethaven אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> after בִּנְיָמִֽין׃ <WH1144> thee O Benjamin

אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day תּֽוֹכֵחָ֑ה <WH8433> of rebuke בְּשִׁבְטֵי֙ <WH7626> among the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> have I made known נֶאֱמָנָֽה׃ <WH539> that which shall surely be

הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> have become שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> The princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כְּמַסִּיגֵ֖י <WH5253> were like them that remove גְּב֑וּל <WH1366> the bound עֲלֵיהֶ֕ם <WH5921> on אֶשְׁפּ֥וֹךְ <WH8210> [therefore] I will pour out כַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> upon them like water עֶבְרָתִֽי׃ <WH5678> my wrath

עָשׁ֥וּק <WH6217> oppressed אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> Ephraim רְצ֣וּץ <WH7533> [and] broken מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> in judgment כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because הוֹאִ֔יל <WH2974> because he willingly הָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> walked אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after צָֽו׃ <WH6673> the commandment

וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am כָעָ֖שׁ <WH6211> as a moth לְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Therefore [will] I [be] unto Ephraim וְכָרָקָ֖ב <WH7538> as rottenness לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיַּ֨רְא <WH7200> saw אֶפְרַ֜יִם <WH669> When Ephraim אֶת־ <WH853> חָלְי֗וֹ <WH2483> his sickness וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> and Judah אֶת־ <WH853> מְזֹר֔וֹ <WH4205> [saw] his wound וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim אֶל־ <WH413> to אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> to the Assyrian וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> and sent אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to king יָרֵ֑ב <WH3377> Jareb וְה֗וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יוּכַל֙ <WH3201> yet could לִרְפֹּ֣א <WH7495> he not heal לָכֶ֔ם וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Or יִגְהֶ֥ה <WH1455> you nor cure מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> at מָזֽוֹר׃ <WH4205> you of your wound

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I כַשַּׁ֙חַל֙ <WH7826> as a lion לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> For I [will be] unto Ephraim וְכַכְּפִ֖יר <WH3715> and as a young lion לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֶטְרֹף֙ <WH2963> I [even] I will tear וְאֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> and go אֶשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> I will take away וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and none shall rescue

אֵלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> will go אָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <WH7725> [and] return אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמִ֔י <WH4725> to my place עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> they יֶאְשְׁמ֖וּ <WH816> till they acknowledge their offence וּבִקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> and seek פָנָ֑י <WH6440> my face בַּצַּ֥ר <WH6862> in their affliction לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> they יְשַׁחֲרֻֽנְנִי׃ <WH7836> they will seek me early
